question: Your colleague recently gave you a book. You had a presentation, and this bookhelped you in the presentation. Write a letter to your colleague.In your letter,• tell the topic of your presentation• why the presentation was important for you• how the book helped you in presentation
text: I hope this letter finds you in the pink of health. I am penning down this letter to let you know that my recent presentation on cloud computing went extremely well . All because of the volume " Great Insight of Cloud Computers " which you presented to me. I would like to share my happiness with you.  I am going to elucidate copious motives in the forthcoming paragraphs.

To begin with, the first notion, I gave an introduction to how cloud concepts help in handling Artificial Intelligence in the techno fest  programme organized by Google firm in Berlin. As I am focusing to pursue my career in advanced technologies and this submission will be a very fruitful vantage to achieve my goal. In addition to this, I will be capable to apply for dream companies across the globe. Besides, The manual which you presented to me helped a lot in preparing the required concise content. Further, The book has end-end concepts which saved a lot of my time instead of searching for the content over the Internet.
In a nutshell, according to the forenamed propositions, I would like to restate my vista that your edition assisted me tremendously well during my demonstration. Looking forward to meeting you soon.
